title: Windows Registry & System Fix
description: Resolve deep system errors and registry-related stability issues on Windows.

steps.title: Run System File Checker (SFC)
steps.instruction: CMD as Admin → type 'sfc /scannow'. This scans all protected system files and replaces corrupted ones with a cached copy.

steps.title: Run Image Repair (DISM)
steps.instruction: If SFC fails: CMD as Admin → 'dism /online /cleanup-image /restorehealth'. This downloads fresh system files from Microsoft servers.

steps.title: Fix Broken Registry Keys
steps.instruction: Avoid 'Registry Cleaners'. Instead, find the specific app's key in 'regedit' under HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software and delete only that app's folder to reset it.

steps.title: Check Disk for File System Errors
steps.instruction: CMD as Admin → 'chkdsk C: /f'. You will need to reboot; this fixes logical errors in the file structure that look like registry bugs.

steps.title: System Restore
steps.instruction: Type 'rstrui' in Start menu. Choose a point before the issues started. This is the safest way to revert complex registry changes.
